mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tip_board (t_b_content, t_b_views, champion_id, email, t_b_title) VALUES (#{t_b_content}, default, #{champion_id}, #{email}, #{t_b_title});
mapper.select: SELECT tb.*, IFNULL(tr.t_b_recom, 0) AS t_b_recom FROM tip_board tb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS t_b_recom, t_b_num FROM tip_recom GROUP BY t_b_num ) tr ON tb.t_b_num = tr.t_b_num ORDER BY tb.t_b_num desc;
SELECT * FROM tip_board WHERE t_b_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR t_b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY t_b_content DESC

SELECT tb.*, IFNULL(tr.t_b_recom, 0) AS t_b_recom FROM tip_board tb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS t_b_recom, t_b_num FROM tip_recom WHERE t_b_num = #{t_b_num} GROUP BY t_b_num ) tr ON tb.t_b_num = tr.t_b_num WHERE tb.t_b_num = #{t_b_num}
SELECT * FROM tip_recom WHERE email = #{email} AND t_b_num = #{t_b_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tip_recom WHERE t_b_num = #{t_b_num} AND email = #{email}

UPDATE tip_reply SET t_r_content = #{t_r_content}, t_r_date = default WHERE t_r_num = #{t_r_num};
